about_the_game:
Step into the world of Riaru Meta Gēmu aka The Real Meta Game, a true metagame that challenges you to achieve the highest score while unraveling its hidden depths. At first glance, the game might appear to be a frantic FPS shooter, but don't be fooled—there’s much more beneath the surface. Combining intense first-person action with brain-teasing puzzles, this game pushes you to think strategically to uncover all its secrets.

Points are earned through a variety of activities, and solving puzzles is key to boosting your score. As you progress, you'll gradually unveil the intricate layers of the metagame. Compete on global leaderboards to see how your strategy stacks up against others, and discover the hidden meta story that lies beneath.

For those who enjoy deep, experimental gameplay, Riaru Meta Gēmu aka The Real Meta Game offers multiple layers of play, each one bringing you closer to understanding the full scope of the game. It's not just about winning—it's about finding the most efficient path and mastering the meta.

Doesn't he understand what's going on? Never mind. Try it for yourself!

Key Features:

  • A true metagame experience with endless possibilities for scoring and strategies

  • Beginning of the first chapter: Who Dice—FPS gameplay combined with puzzles to challenge both reflexes and intellect

  • Score Attack—Compete on global leaderboards and uncover hidden mechanics

Dive into Riaru Meta Gēmu aka The Real Meta Game—the first real meta game—and see if you have what it takes to become a true master!

name: Riaru Meta Gēmu – Who Dice 【リアルメタゲーム】

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 12 compatible with Shader Model 6 support
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: The game is controlled using a keyboard and mouse. Gamepads are currently not supported.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 64-bit
  • Processor: Octa-core Intel or AMD processor, 3 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX Series (e.g., RTX 3060 or higher) or AMD Radeon RX 6000 Series (e.g., RX 6800 or higher)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: The game is controlled using a keyboard and mouse. Gamepads are currently not supported.

short_description: Game challenges you to master both frantic FPS action and intricate puzzles, all while uncovering hidden layers of gameplay. Compete on global leaderboards and dive deep into the first true metagame experience. Will you uncover its secrets or get lost in its complexity?
